Job Description: We are excited to launch this job opportunity to diverse men and women experienced in software development with a large satellite communications company.    Responsibilities    - Develop and deploy new technologies on a cuttingedge network   - Innovate, design and develop in the world of SDN, NFV and Network Virtualization.    - Design, develop and deploy new and innovative technology into a service provider network.    - Experience the whole life cycle of networking software development - all the way from design to deployment.    - Work with senior engineers to aid in design, documentation, testing, analyses, test plans, and test execution, to ensure deployed networks meet client needs.
